title: Comments to the European Union on Commission Issues Concerning a Possible Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM)
author: unknown
text: Comments to the European Union on Commission Issues Concerning a Possible Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) Comments derived from research with collaborators from Georgetown University to develop a published framework (attached) for WTO-compliant border tax adjustments in the context of a US upstream greenhouse gas tax. To read submitted comments, please click "View Testimony and Public Comments" above.
